===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
Variant of {{och-l|老}} – {{Han compound|耂|t1=an old man with long hair, bent over|匕|t2=a cane|ls=ic}} – an old man, leaning on a cane. Compare top component to {{och-l|孝}}.

Structurally related to {{och-l|老}}; the most commonly cited example of {{zh-l|*轉注|reciprocal meaning}}.
